tool.help:
PanPhlAn is a strain-level metagenomic profiling tool for identifying the gene composition of individual strains in metagenomic samples.
PanPhlAnâ€™s ability for strain-tracking and functional analysis of unknown pathogens makes it an efficient tool for culture-free infectious outbreak epidemiology and microbial population studies.
